name: vue-eslint-parser
description: The ESLint custom parser for `.vue` files.

scripts.setup: git submodule update --init && cd test/fixtures/eslint && npm install
scripts.watch:test: wait-on index.js && warun index.js "test/*.js" "test/fixtures/ast/*/*.json" "test/fixtures/*" --debounce 1000 --no-initial -- nyc -r lcov npm run -s _mocha
scripts.watch:update-ast: wait-on index.js && warun index.js "test/fixtures/ast/*/*.vue" -- node scripts/update-fixtures-ast.js
